channel.title: CVE Feed for wpcalc -- Modal Window – create popup modal window
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wpcalc -- Modal Window – create popup modal window

item.title: CVE-2024-2457|2024-04-09T18:58:57.293Z -- wpcalc -- Modal Window – create popup modal window
item.description: The Modal Window – create popup modal window plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's shortcode(s) in all versions up to, and including, 5.3.8 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
